data.title: Are there any good anime shows like Gundam 00?
data.meta_description: Answer: Try the other Gundam series such as Mobile Suit Gundam Wing. I'd go with Iron Blooded Orphans as the next Gundam series you watch. Aldnoah.Zero is a decent anime too. A few others I'd include are Big O, Darling In The FranXX, Eureka Seven, Genesis Of Aquarion, Knights Of Sidonia, Buddy Co...
